body_html:
Thanks for quick response. @asimshankar

I have moved the code into this project, https://github.com/tobegit3hub/distributed_tensorflow .

You can follow the README to run in standalone and distributed mode. It's easy to re-produce the issue. If it's the problem of our code, please let me know and any feedback is really appreciated.
